Item 5.02 - Departure of Directors or Ce.content: JPMorgan Chase & Co. (the "Firm") announced today that two of its directors, Timothy P. Flynn and Michael A. Neal, have decided to retire from the Board of Directors of the Firm (the "Board") when their terms expire on the eve of the 2024 Annual Meeting of Shareholders. The Board accepted their decisions to retire and thanked them for their outstanding service.
